Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
NetworkClient, OfflineClient
public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
Since the project supports the possibility of playing an offline solo mode match, this abstract class has methods and attributes that a NetworkClient and OfflineClient has in common to run and display game.
